scripts.say: Diadem of Light - Surrounding Waters
Are you done yet, Thiele? It's almost time for lunch.
I'm doing the best I can... I'll be done recording soon, so just wait a little longer.
They've created an enclosed space within this area of the sea, one that cannot be observed from the outside. It's like a magic boundary created using Siren technology.
It's not magic; our technology is just not sufficiently advanced yet.
More importantly, how's your ammo?
I have plenty of it.
And your rigging?
Everything is functioning normally.
That's a good girl. And our escape route?
I have one secured, but I doubt we'll need it.
Heheh, you never know. Just in case~
Do you think Akagi's plan is going to fall through?
I'm not worried about it, but the lady in charge is.
I even had to draft this backup plan just to sate her paranoia.
I see... Still, this plan Akagi came up with is really na√Øve.
Not to mention dangerous. The Sirens are not easily fooled.
We should be fine if it goes as planned and we can use this ritual as a way to bolster our forces. If it doesn't, however...
As long as the Sakura Empire ends up taking the fall for whatever happens, it shouldn't really matter who is leading them, right? This whole thing leaves a bad taste in my mouth though.
I know, but it's still awful.
The bottom line is, these are our orders. Are you having second thoughts?
No, absolutely not...
Okay, I made a final sweep and saved our coordinates.
Good. Now then, let's stop pretending like we're lost and head over to them. We don't want to make them wait around too long~
